subject.name: Sydney Sweeney

appearance.hair: Long, flowing honey-blonde straight hair style
appearance.expression: Playful, alluring gaze with mouth slightly open
appearance.makeup: Soft glam, rosy cheeks, red glossy lips, defined lashes

outfit.top: Red and black checkered/houndstooth tweed cropped blazer with long sleeves and three large pearl buttons
outfit.bottom: Matching red and black checkered/houndstooth high-waisted tweed adherent miniskirt and black fishnets
outfit.footwear: Light red patent leather pointed-toe stiletto pumps with signature red soles (Christian Louboutin)

subject.pose: Climbing a wooden ladder, body turned sideways to the camera, looking back over the left shoulder, left leg straight on a lower rung, right leg bent with foot placed on a higher rung, left hand holding the ladder side, right hand reaching out towards a shelf

background_elements.shelving: White arched built-in shelves filled with different little bottles of perfumes
background_elements.branding: Gold script text on the wall reading 'Passion BY SYDNEY' and 'EAU DE PARFUM'
background_elements.flooring: red and black checkered tile floor
background_elements.props: Rustic wooden ladder leaning against the shelves

photography_style.lighting: Soft, diffuse studio lighting, pastel color grading, bright and airy atmosphere
photography_style.composition: Full-body shot, low angle perspective looking slightly up, depth of field
photography_style.aesthetic: High-fashion editorial, commercial fragrance campaign, coquettish, feminine, playful, candy-core
